description: About 45,000 people who pay on a Prior Year Basis will be moved onto the new system from next year.
title: Jersey islanders to pay tax on current year earnings
title_page: Jersey islanders to pay tax on current year earnings - BBC News
maintext: However, the States will still need to recoup this money, and the treasury minister has proposed the debt would need to paid by individuals "at some point" in their lifetime.
